title: ImageNameSubstitutor results in ClassNotFoundException

labels.name: triage/upstream
labels.description: Used for issues which are caused by issues in upstream projects/dependency

body:
### Describe the bug When trying to use an `ImageNameSubstitutor` with a `@QuarkusTest` I get a `ClassNotFoundException`.
Details 
/Users/tylerthrailkill/.asdf/installs/java/openjdk-18/bin/java -ea -Djava.util.logging.manager=org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager -Didea.test.cyclic.buffer.size=1048576 -javaagent:/Users/tylerthrailkill/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/IDEA-U/ch-0/223.8836.41/IntelliJ IDEA.app/Contents/lib/idea_rt.jar=52701:/Users/tylerthrailkill/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/IDEA-U/ch-0/223.8836.41/IntelliJ IDEA.app/Contents/bin -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Dsun.stdout.encoding=UTF-8 -Dsun.stderr.encoding=UTF-8 -classpath ... com.intellij.rt.junit.JUnitStarter -ideVersion5 -junit5 org.acme.getting.started.testing.StaticContentTest

When debugging this I discovered that the ImageNameSubstitutor is using the wrong classpath, but this all works fine if I do not use QuarkusTest. If I build on the newest SNAPSHOT (apr 13) then I get a different error:

It appears like the later error messages ### Expected behavior I would expect it to find the ImageNameSubstitutor without problem. ### Actual behavior The class is not found and no amount of moving classes around, compiling in different orders, etc. fix the issue. ### How to Reproduce? [getting-started-testing.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11225697/getting-started-testing.zip) I took the getting-started-testing project from the quarkus quickstarts and modified it to show the problem. Simply run any of the tests and the problem will be demonstrated. ### Output of `uname -a` or `ver` Darwin SR-MB-502963 22.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.3.0: Mon Jan 30 20:38:37 PST 2023; root:xnu-8792.81.3~2/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64 ### Output of `java -version` openjdk version "17.0.5" 2022-10-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.3.0 (build 17.0.5+8-jvmci-22.3-b08) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM GraalVM CE 22.3.0 (build 17.0.5+8-jvmci-22.3-b08, mixed mode, sharing) ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) openjdk version "17.0.5" 2022-10-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.3.0 (build 17.0.5+8-jvmci-22.3-b08) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM GraalVM CE 22.3.0 (build 17.0.5+8-jvmci-22.3-b08, mixed mode, sharing) ### Quarkus version or git rev 999-SNAPSHOT ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) Warning: JAVA_HOME environment variable is not set. Apache Maven 3.8.6 (84538c9988a25aec085021c365c560670ad80f63) Maven home: /Users/tylerthrailkill/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.8.6-bin/67568434/apache-maven-3.8.6 Java version: 17.0.5, vendor: GraalVM Community, runtime: /Users/tylerthrailkill/.asdf/installs/java/graalvm-22.3.0+java17 Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "13.2.1", arch: "aarch64", family: "mac" ### Additional information I posted about it in the testcontainers slack with no response https://testcontainers.slack.com/archives/C04RM836XUP/p1681402435417559 I posted about it in the quarkus zulip with no response https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187030-users/topic/Quarkus.20Class.20loader.20can't.20find.20testcontainers.20resource
